attributes.action: Let Mr Robert Fidler keep his Home and Stop it from being Demolished.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Robert Fidler built his dream home for himeself and his family.

When it was finished in 2002, complete with ramparts and a cannon, the 60-year-old moved in with his wife and son and lived there clandestinely for four years.

Reigate & Banstead Borough Council have issued an order to demolish it.

Mr Fidler appealed and a High Court battle ensued but the judge ruled the building must be destroyed.

Mr Fidler has built a beutiful home, and as this petition goes to you, there have been no objections from neighbours to this house being built.

rejection.details: The judiciary is independent of government. Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
